title: As a worker who is affected by intermediaries legislation, I need to know what happens if HMRC open an IR35 investigation on me, so that I know what I need to do to comply with the HMRC investigation to resolve the matter satisfactorily (100597)

details.benefit: I know what I need to do to comply with the HMRC investigation to resolve the matter satisfactorily
details.goal: know what happens if HMRC open an IR35 investigation on me
met_when: understands why HMRC will open an enquiry
understand the enquiry process, what HMRC will require from them and their responsibilities
knows about the penalties that can apply if they are found to be within IR35
details.role: worker who is affected by intermediaries legislation

available_translations.title: As a worker who is affected by intermediaries legislation, I need to know what happens if HMRC open an IR35 investigation on me, so that I know what I need to do to comply with the HMRC investigation to resolve the matter satisfactorily (100597)
